page.title: 15Housing
page.content: In Pebworth and area there are about ll4 dwellings plus l5 farm houses.10 of the 75 council houses are now privately owned. They may be purchased from the council at Â£8 - l2,000 depending on length of occupation. Long Marston's proportion of council houses is 20%.Most homes are built of red brick or cotswold or wilmcote stone and have mains drains, electricity and water but no gas supply despite the gas main travelling through the area. The majority of private dwellings have oil or solid fuel cental heating. In Pebworth l2 homes have been built in the past 5 years where only infilling and barn conversions are allowed at present. Building is prohibited in Long Marston. 3 bedroomed houses range from Â£46 - 50,000 and 4 - 5 bedroomed ones sell for up to Â£95,000.
